# Queen Hyosa

| religion     = Buddhism
}}
Queen Hyosa of the Ansan Kim clan (; 1022â€“?) was a Goryeo princess as the daughter of King Hyeonjong and Queen Wonhye, also the full younger sister of King Munjong and King Jeonggan who became the third wife of her half brother, King Deokjong. Since they were once came from the same clan, Queen Hyosa became one of the Goryeo queens who followed their maternal clan.
